Control.name: reg_grd_path:debug
Control.desc: reg_grd_path : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0input selection of grid build, 0:DS input, 1: Ori input

Control.name: reg_bit_in:debug
Control.desc: reg_bit_in : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1010bit or 12bit source input bit-width

Control.name: reg_in_ds_phs_x
Control.desc: reg_in_ds_phs_x : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0Input down-sample x phase on decimation mode

Control.name: reg_in_ds_phs_y
Control.desc: reg_in_ds_phs_y : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0Input down-sample y phase on decimation mode

Control.name: reg_in_ds_bit
Control.desc: reg_in_ds_bit : // unsigned , RW, default = 8Input down-sample register, value = [8,10], 8:8bits, 10: 10bits

Control.name: reg_in_ds_mode
Control.desc: reg_in_ds_mode : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0Input down-sample registers, normally AVG. 0: AVG, 1:decimation

Control.name: reg_in_ds_rate_x:debug
Control.desc: reg_in_ds_rate_x : // unsigned ,RW, default = 2Input down-sample registers, normally AVG. value = [0,1,2], change according to input resolution. real rate is 2^reg_in_ds_rate

Control.name: reg_in_ds_rate_y:debug
Control.desc: reg_in_ds_rate_y : // unsigned ,RW, default = 2Input down-sample registers, normally AVG. value = [0,1,2], change according to input resolution. real rate is 2^reg_in_ds_rate

Control.name: reg_avg_cor_th
Control.desc: reg_avg_cor_th : // unsigned ,RW, default = 10AVG de-contouring threshold

Control.name: reg_big_cor_th
Control.desc: reg_big_cor_th : // unsigned ,RW, default = 18BiG de-contouring threshold

Control.name: reg_flt_cor_en
Control.desc: reg_flt_cor_en : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1AVG and BiG coring enable

Control.name: reg_map_bld_mode
Control.desc: reg_map_bld_mode : // unsigned ,RW, default = 2Blending mode of diversmap and final detail map, 2bits,1:final map,1:diversity map, 2:MIN, 3:blend

Control.name: reg_map_bld_alpha
Control.desc: reg_map_bld_alpha : // unsigned ,RW, default = 10blending alpha of map, [0,16]

Control.name: reg_final_bld_gain
Control.desc: reg_final_bld_gain : // unsigned ,RW, default = 00~256 TODO

Control.name: reg_bld1_mode
Control.desc: reg_bld1_mode : // unsigned ,RW, default = 2blending 1 mode, 0: AVG flt, 1: BiG flt, 2:blending value = [0,1,2];

Control.name: reg_pmap_manual_alp
Control.desc: reg_pmap_manual_alp : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0manual setting for decontour alpha blender, the larger the more filter

Control.name: reg_pmap_detail_enable
Control.desc: reg_pmap_detail_enable : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1enable of the detail map for post map detection

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_enable
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_enable : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0enable of luma based scale for DC strength, 0: no luma scl on dc_map; 1: enable of luma scl on dc_map

Control.name: reg_pmap_colorprt_enable
Control.desc: reg_pmap_colorprt_enable : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0enable of color protection based on the color

Control.name: reg_pmap_manual_enable
Control.desc: reg_pmap_manual_enable : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0enable for manual alpha for dc filter result blender

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_sel
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_sel : // unsigned ,RW, default = 2selection of the luma for luma based scale 0: original; 1 avg; 2/up: bilateral_grid results

Control.name: reg_pmap_colorprotect_sel
Control.desc: reg_pmap_colorprotect_sel : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1selection of the UV for color protection desion, 0: original; 1: avg; 2/up: bilateral_grid results

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_gain
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_gain : // unsigned ,RW, default = 64u2.6

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_mag
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_mag : // signed ,RW, default = 0luma map magnitude

Control.name: reg_pmap_colorprotect_gain
Control.desc: reg_pmap_colorprotect_gain : // unsigned ,RW, default = 64scale to the color protection strength, the larger the more protection, norm to 64 as 1.0

Control.name: reg_pmap_colorprotect_mag
Control.desc: reg_pmap_colorprotect_mag : // signed ,RW, default = 0magnitude of the color protection module

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_0
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_0 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 8luma based scale on dc_map, normalized to 32 as 1.0. the larger, the more DC filtered

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_1
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_1 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 16luma based scale on dc_map, normalized to 32 as 1.0. the larger, the more DC filtered

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_2
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_2 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 32luma based scale on dc_map, normalized to 32 as 1.0. the larger, the more DC filtered

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_3
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_3 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 32luma based scale on dc_map, normalized to 32 as 1.0. the larger, the more DC filtered

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_4
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_4 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 32luma based scale on dc_map, normalized to 32 as 1.0. the larger, the more DC filtered

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_5
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_5 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 32luma based scale on dc_map, normalized to 32 as 1.0. the larger, the more DC filtered

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_6
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_6 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 32luma based scale on dc_map, normalized to 32 as 1.0. the larger, the more DC filtered

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_7
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_7 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 32luma based scale on dc_map, normalized to 32 as 1.0. the larger, the more DC filtered

Control.name: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_8
Control.desc: reg_pmap_luma_scl_lut_8 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 32luma based scale on dc_map, normalized to 32 as 1.0. the larger, the more DC filtered

Control.desc: reg_rand_frm_rst : // unsigned, RW, default = 0pulse, rst frm_cnt

Control.name: reg_rand_enable_0
Control.desc: reg_rand_enable_0 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0enable to add random noise for luma

Control.name: reg_rand_enable_1
Control.desc: reg_rand_enable_1 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0enable to add random noise for u

Control.name: reg_rand_enable_2
Control.desc: reg_rand_enable_2 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 0enable to add random noise for v

Control.name: reg_rand_reset_0
Control.desc: reg_rand_reset_0 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1reset of the rand seeds for luma

Control.name: reg_rand_reset_1
Control.desc: reg_rand_reset_1 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1reset of the rand seeds for u

Control.name: reg_rand_reset_2
Control.desc: reg_rand_reset_2 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1reset of the rand seeds for v

Control.name: reg_dth_en_0
Control.desc: reg_dth_en_0 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1enable of the dither for y

Control.name: reg_dth_en_1
Control.desc: reg_dth_en_1 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1enable of the dither for u

Control.name: reg_dth_en_2
Control.desc: reg_dth_en_2 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1enable of the dither for v

Control.name: reg_dth_mod
Control.desc: reg_dth_mod : // unsigned ,RW, default = 1mode for yuv

Control.name: reg_dth_mod_BiG
Control.desc: reg_dth_mod_BiG : // unsigned ,RW, default = 3mode for BiG

Control.name: reg_rand_noise_gain_0
Control.desc: reg_rand_noise_gain_0 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 8gain to the random before added to the signal, normalize to 8 as 1.0

Control.name: reg_rand_noise_gain_1
Control.desc: reg_rand_noise_gain_1 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 8gain to the random before added to the signal, normalize to 8 as 1.0

Control.name: reg_randgain_dcmap_thrd_0
Control.desc: reg_randgain_dcmap_thrd_0 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 80thrd to mapu8(finmap_u12 right_sft 4) for strength , mapu8<th[0], strn=0; mapu8<th[1], strn=1,

Control.name: reg_randgain_dcmap_thrd_1
Control.desc: reg_randgain_dcmap_thrd_1 : // unsigned ,RW, default = 128thrd to mapu8(finmap_u12 right_sft 4) for strength , mapu8<th[0], strn=0; mapu8<th[1], strn=1,

Control.desc: reg_sta_map_opt : // unsigned ,RW, default = 00:dir map, 1: divr_map, 2:divr_map_final

Control.desc: reg_debug_out_en : // unsigned, RW, default = 0

Control.name: reg_demo_mode
Control.desc: reg_demo_mode : // unsigned ,RW, default = 00: off, 1: left on, right off, 2: left off, right on
